overview:
Borgata Hotel Casino & Spa is located on the East Coast in Atlantic City. Offers luxurious accomodation, spa, restaurants and world famous entertainment vanues.

The Borgata Hotel offers a rich variety of luxury suites and rooms as well as full-service spa and fitness center. The Borgata Casino features slots and table games. This casino resort includes Atlantic City gambling facilities, Atlantic City poker tournaments and more. The Borgata day spa offers relaxation choices including luxury pools, a full-service salon, and the greatest massages in Atlantic City.
